overview: The film follows BUCK and D, in a journey to search for a burial ground after BUCK confesses a secret to D. After confessing to D, Buck makes sure with his decision and convinces D to help him. D tells him they need to find a place to bury him. They both go on a journey to seek a perfect burial ground for him. At first, D doesnâ€™t buy with his idea until she witnesses his condition.
title: JISIM
